data.eml:eml: Synopsis of the tribe Stipeae (Poaceae) in Nepal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nobis, Marcin, Gudkova, Polina D., Pendry, Colin A. (2019): Synopsis of the tribe Stipeae (Poaceae) in Nepal. PhytoKeys 128: 97-119, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.128.34637, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.128.34637
